data.title: Who's in and who's out: A look at the Saskatchewan Roughriders heading into CFL free agency
data.meta_description: As CFL free agency nears, here's a look at who is under contract for next season and who is set to hit the open market
data.text:
As CFL free agency nears, here's a look at who is under contract for next season and who is set to hit the open market

Article content

With free agency set to open across the CFL on Tuesday at 11 a.m., here’s a look at the current makeup of the Saskatchewan Roughriders roster and some key pieces that could be added to the team.

We apologize, but this video has failed to load.

Try refreshing your browser, or

tap here to see other videos from our team.

Who's in and who's out: A look at the Saskatchewan Roughriders heading into CFL free agency Back to video

*denotes American player, **denotes Global player

QUARTERBACK

Under contract: Trevor Harris*, Mason Fine*, Shea Patterson*, Antonio Pipkin*

Pending free agents: Jake Dolegala*

Available: Matthew Shiltz*, Nick Arbuckle*, Dominique Davis*, Dakota Prukop*

Analysis: Harris is the undisputed starter but who will earn the No. 2 spot behind him? The Riders elected to re-sign Fine over Dolagala, who will become a free agent. Can Patterson push to be the backup? Pipkin will handle short yardage this year.

RUNNING BACK/FULLBACK

Under contract: Frankie Hickson*, Thomas Bertrand-Hudon, Jerrion Ealy*, Bruno LaBelle (fullback), Morgan Runge (fullback)

Pending free agents: Jamal Morrow*, Albert Awachie (fullback)

Available: A.J. Ouellette*, Ka’Deem Carey*, Sean Thomas-Erlington

Analysis: The Roughriders will sign Ouellette on the opening day of free agency, which lands them one of the top running backs in the league. Other potential available names like Brady Oliveira (Winnipeg) and William Stanback (B.C.) have already signed offers.

Article content

Advertisement 3

Story continues below

This advertisement has not loaded yet, but your article continues below.

Article content

RECEIVER

Under contract: Shawn Bane Jr.*, Samuel Emilus, Kian Schaffer-Baker, Brayden Lenius, Mitch Picton, Geronimo Allison*, Jerreth Sterns*, Mario Alford*, Kendall Watson*, Jake Parker*, Dohnte Meyers*, Kalija Lipscomb*

Pending free agents: Tevin Jones*, Juwan Brescacin

Available: Tim White*, Lucky Whitehead*, Luther Hakunavanhu, Shaq Evans*, Rasheed Bailey*, Terry Godwin II*

Analysis: Bane Jr. proved to be one of Saskatchewan’s best signings from last year. Could Allison, a veteran NFLer, be another good get for the Riders get this off-season? The Riders have lots of Canadian talent to fill two starting spots once again with Emilus leading the way.

OFFENSIVE LINE

Under contract: Peter Godber, Philip Blake, Logan Ferland, Noah Zerr, Brandon Council*, Jordan Tucker*, Trevor Reid*, Jerald Hawkins*, Logan Bandy, Zack Fry, Evan Floren

Pending free agents: Eric Lofton*, Evan Johnson, Colin Kelly*

Available: Jermarcus Hardrick*, Trevon Tate*, Landon Rice, Ryan Sceviour, Geoff Gray, Hunter Steward

Analysis: The Riders have reportedly signed Hardrick, who is the top offensive lineman available. That answers any questions at right tackle. With Godber in the middle and Ferland and Blake on either side of him, there will be competition at left tackle, with Tucker currently the leading candidate. Could Hawkins return to the team as well?

Advertisement 4

Story continues below

This advertisement has not loaded yet, but your article continues below.

Article content

DEFENSIVE LINE

Under contract: Anthony Lanier II*, Bryan Cox Jr.*, Miles Brown*, Christian Albright*, Charbel Dabire, Lake Korte-Moore, Nicholas Dheilly, Habakkuk Baldonado**, Roman Harrison*, Caleb Sanders*, Brayden Thomas*

Pending free agents: Micah Johnson*, Pete Robertson*, DeMarcus Christmas*

Available: Mathieu Betts, Malik Carney*, Ricky Walker*, Shawn Oakman*

Analysis: The Riders will likely add some talent along the defensive line in free agency (it’s being reported that the Riders will sign Carney), but there isn’t a major hole considering the amount of American and Canadian talent they have returning. Plus, Lanier II is moving back to defensive tackle this year, which makes up for Johnson’s absence.

LINEBACKER

Under contract: C.J. Reavis*, Adam Auclair, T.J. Brunson*, A.J. Allen, Jaxon Ciraolo-Brown, Zakoby McClain*, K.D. Davis*, Matt Dean, Mark McLaurin*, Jaylen Moody*, Nick Thomas

Pending free agents: Larry Dean*, Micah Teitz, Justin Herdman-Reed

Released: Derrick Moncrief

Available: Jameer Thurman*, Micah Awe*, Adam Auclair, Simoni Lawrence*, Avery Williams*, Nic Cross

Advertisement 5

Story continues below

This advertisement has not loaded yet, but your article continues below.

Article content

Analysis: It appears the Roughriders will add one of the top available linebackers to replace Dean, as it’s being reported that Saskatchewan will sign Thurman when free agency opens on Tuesday. Next to Thurman, Reavis will step into a full-time role at strong-side linebacker with Moncrief being released.

Update: On Friday, the Riders added a player expected to compete for the weak-side linebacker position previously held by Teitz, as Auclair officially signed with the team. While Allen will also be in the mix, Auclair, who had 63 tackles in 18 games last season with Ottawa, is likely the frontrunner. The 27-year-old was Ottawa’s first-round selection, sixth overall, in the 2020 CFL Draft.

DEFENSIVE BACK

Under contract: Amari Henderson*, Rolan Milligan Jr.*, Deontai Williams*, Jayden Dalke, Nelson Lokombo, Jaxon Ford, Godfrey Onyeka, Kosi Onyeka, Rodney Clemons*, Cole Coleman*, Mark Fields II*, C.J. Coldon*, Nick Nelson*

Pending free agents: Jeremy Clark*

Released: Nic Marshall*

Available: Jalon Edwards-Cooper*, Jamal Peters*, Demario Houston*, Richard Leonard*, Robertson Daniel*

Advertisement 6

Story continues below

This advertisement has not loaded yet, but your article continues below.

Article content

Analysis: It’s being reported that the Riders will sign Edwards-Cooper, who will step into a shutdown cornerback spot. The other could be filled by Williams, who saw time at corner and halfback last year. A healthy Milligan Jr. will be an important addition to the Riders secondary in 2024 alongside other returning starters Henderson and Dalke.

SPECIAL TEAMS

Under contract: Adam Korsak** (punter), Brett Lauther (kicker), Jorgen Hus (long snapper)

Pending free agents: None

Analysis: The Riders have their three specialists locked up for 2024 and will only be adding names for training camp competition/contingency.
